No, it's ラーヴア in the raw, no mi sound.   If anything else, it would be Ravua/Rava/Lava/Lavua.  I think Lavia is fine.

This is Amazing She's A Goddess 😘   I want to bang her too
You don't need any more invitation than what's on page 8

Next, Ravia also said that she already did it with other men before. Now tell me the likelyhood of a plane crashing at the same place and meeting the same girl. This might be far fetched since she might as well be travelling the world for that to happen. However, I think not. I think she's purposely targetting japanese men because they taste good and feel good according to her.

Lastly, at the last page, the man said "I think I forgot something". You might think that he was talking about grtting back to the main force and you're correct. However, why would the author just put it in for no reason? So I deducted that he said it because he is under the hypnosis of Ravia. Imagine this, You're a soldier for your whole life but then you meet a suspicious girl on an unknown island. You had sex with her  after eating a suspicious fruit and now you forgot about your whole life's purpose.

If that's not suspicious, I don't know what is. Hence, that is my theory regarding the girl named Ravia.

I see... I for one feel dark after reading this. Let me explain:

From the premise of tje story, it would seem that this is a story that takes place during WWII or WWI. This also explains where the man came from which is a plane crash. The girl Ravia might be a demon or deity considering how many the author had books about demon girls. That in and of itself is no harm at all.

However, the last panel showed it all. The man's body went from having muscles to being skinny and most likely malnourished. Now, you may ask "how is that possible? He's only been there at 3 hours best".

I predict that he became like that because he had sex with Ravia. Afterall, sex demons are a favourite for this author. Let me say it again sex "demons". Demons don't take things for free here as author really made a research of the give and take culture of the demons.

With the suspicious fruit to add, which I think contributed as to why he is horny at that moment, it's easy to assume that he is already dead
That was beautiful

This may sound like a huge ass stretch but it honestly feels like Ravia-chan is supposed to be like a girl from my country, the Philippines. Why? Well the title of this doujin has "Southern Island" in its title, and the setting seems to be based on WWII. My country's practically one of the closest islands outside Japan. Now obviously the "Southern Island" mentioned here couldn't possibly be Taiwan, because most Taiwanese people look nothing like Ravia-chan. However, the problem about this entire speculation though is that Ravia is such an outlandish name that it doesn't even exist. But oh well, I tried.

going by the author's usual works there's a strong possibility that this is a supernatural setting.

Y'all are reading too much into this. Guy fucks a girl, and forgets about the war. Yes she might be a temptatious nymph but there's nothing to overtly point to supernatural and more precisely maleficent intentions. At the end the soldier does even remember "Oh that's right". It can be interpreted either way, which stops the work from being overly saccharine, so let's leave it at that.
It's more likely she's taking his life force by fvking him, I think?

I'm not too sure about the story here, but from the title of this book compilation, it seems like it's written with the implication of being saved or being fulfilled in emotional way. I think the last part is about him forgetting about everything and living a laid back life afterward. Or it's actually fantasy setting and she is actually a dryad who sucking the life away from him while providing him the  peace of mind in the last moment.
